alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:54PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pondera, Liberty, Glacier, Toole, northeastern Teton and northwestern Chouteau Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 552 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over portions of North-central Montana. Movement was north at 15 mph. Widely scattered showers and thunderstorms with brief heavy rain and cloud to ground lightning are moving northward through the western portions of North-central Montana this afternoon. Conditions are also favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Cut Bank, Conrad, Chester, Browning, Valier, Sunburst, Dutton, Kevin, Lothair, Brady, The Knees, Heart Butte, North Browning, South Browning, Power, Carter, Dupuyer, Babb and Floweree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Find shelter if a storm moves over your area.
